title: Kannai Kasakkum Sooriyano Lyrics Red
stanzas:
kannai kasakkum suriyano
red red red red
kaanum mannil sari paadhi
red red red red
udambil odum sengurudhi
red red red red
uzhaikkum makkal ullankai
red red red red

nirathukku ovvoru madhippu
andha nirangalil sivappae sirappu
nirathukku ovvoru madhippu
andha nirangalil sivappae sirappu
ada varumaiyin niramaa sivappu
adhai maattrum niramae sivappu

pillai thamizh inamae
ezhu ezhu ezhu,
arivai aandavanaai
thozhu thozhu thozhu
neelum aagaayam
thodu thodu thodu
nilavai bhoomiyilae
nadu nadu nadu

kannai thirakkum
kalvi ingae kurudaai ponadhae,
kaasu erindhaal
kadhavu thirakkum
vaanigam aanadhae.

thalaimagal thannadhu
magalai chaerkka
palli aeginaal,
veedai vittru
kattanam katti
veedu thirumbinaal,

sariyaa sariyaa?
oru kalvi manidha
urumai endru
kaanalayaa?
muraiyaa?
oru aezhai veettil
kalvi ebna poiyaa?

kudikkum thaaypaalukku
vilai ondrum kaetkaathae,
padikkum padippai nee
panam kaettu virkaadhae(2)

en tamizhnaatin makkal
thogaiyoe aaru kodigal,
indhiya naattin makkal
thogaiyoe nooru kodigal.

kuzhandhaai,
kuzhandhaai,
idhu potti ulagam,
potti pottu mundhividu,
kozhunthae,
Â idhu naadu aala,
puligal vaazhum kaadu.

kaanum mannil sari paadhi
red red red red
udambil odum sengurudhi
red red red red
uzhaikkum makkal ullankai
red red red red

andha nirangalil sivappae sirappu
nirathukku ovvoru madhippu

adhai maattrum niramae sivappu
